alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Delaware County through 945 PM EDT... At 907 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bovina Center, or 9 miles east of Delhi. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Andes, Bovina Center, Halcottsville and New Kingston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy downpours are also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
